page.title: 19Media: Periodicals, Radio
page.content: THe following local newspapers and periodicals circulate in the area:- Oxford Mail (daily evening), Oxford Times (weekly), Abingdon Herald (Weekly), Oxford Star and Oxford Journal (weekly free newspapers). Cumnor Parish News is produced by a volunteer committee and has a large local circulation. Besides information about church activities of all denominations, it includes a monthly report on the work of Cumnor Parish Council and reports on past and future functions of local social groups. The area is within the range of BBC Radio Oxford which will, on request, include in its programmes information about local activities. Radio Wiltshire can also be received in parts of the area.
